1985

Winner

Dire Straits - Brothers in Arms

Possibly the first album I properly enjoyed. I think the video for â€œMoney For Nothingâ€ likely played a part in lodging this stuff firmly into my brain, though it was the start of a very long love affair with Dire Straits and I still credit Mark Knopfler as being the one who made me want to play guitar in the first place.

(Overall, itâ€™s excellent.) Top track: â€œCall It Sleepâ€
